method.name: getStyleSheet
method.description: Returns the style sheet to override default style.

method.name: setStyleSheet
method.description: Sets the style sheet to override default style.

method.name: setBottom
method.description: Sets the HTML text to appear in the bottom text for each page.

method.name: getDocTitle
method.description: Returns the HTML text to appear in the main frame title.

method.name: getBottom
method.description: Returns the HTML text to appear in the bottom text for each page.

method.name: setWindowTitle
method.description: Sets the text to appear in the window title.

method.name: setAdditionalParameters
method.description: Sets the additional parameters passed to the compiler. Each parameter must start with '-'.

method.name: setHeader
method.description: Sets the HTML text to appear in the header for each page.

method.name: setTop
method.description: Sets the HTML text to appear in the top text for each page.

method.name: getTop
method.description: Returns the HTML text to appear in the top text for each page.

method.name: isDeprecation
method.description: Tells whether to generate deprecation information.

method.name: setDocTitle
method.description: Sets the HTML text to appear in the main frame title.

method.name: setFooter
method.description: Sets the HTML text to appear in the footer for each page.

method.name: isUnchecked
method.description: Tells whether to generate unchecked information.

method.name: getHeader
method.description: Returns the HTML text to appear in the header for each page.

method.name: getAdditionalParameters
method.description: Returns the additional parameters passed to the compiler. Each parameter starts with '-'.

method.name: setUnchecked
method.description: Sets whether to generate unchecked information.

method.name: setDeprecation
method.description: Sets whether to generate deprecation information.

method.name: getWindowTitle
method.description: Returns the text to appear in the window title.

method.name: getFooter
method.description: Returns the HTML text to appear in the footer for each page.

property.name: deprecation
property.description: Tells whether to generate deprecation information.

property.name: bottom
property.description: Returns the HTML text to appear in the bottom text for each page.

property.name: windowTitle
property.description: Returns the text to appear in the window title.

property.name: footer
property.description: Returns the HTML text to appear in the footer for each page.

property.name: unchecked
property.description: Tells whether to generate unchecked information.

property.name: docTitle
property.description: Returns the HTML text to appear in the main frame title.

property.name: top
property.description: Returns the HTML text to appear in the top text for each page.

property.name: styleSheet
property.description: Returns the style sheet to override default style.

property.name: additionalParameters
property.description: Returns the additional parameters passed to the compiler. Each parameter starts with '-'.

property.name: header
property.description: Returns the HTML text to appear in the header for each page.
